titles.title: Apostolic Epistles / Pauline Epistles / Gǝbrä ḥawaryat "Acts of the Apostles" / Raʾǝyä Yoḥannǝs "Revelation of John"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Mälʾǝktä Ṗeṭros qädamawi "First Epistle of Peter" [1 Peter] (fols. 4ra-8ra) II) Mälʾǝktä Ṗeṭros dagǝmawi "Second Epistle of Peter" [2 Peter] (fols. 8rb-10vb) III) Mälʾǝktä Yoḥannǝs qädamawi "First Epistle of John" [1 John] (fols. 10vb-14va) IV) Mälʾǝktä Yoḥannǝs dagǝmawi "Second Epistle of John" [2 John] (fols. 14vb-15rb) V) Mälʾǝktä Yoḥannǝs śalǝsawi "Third Epistle of John" [3 John] (fol. 15rb-vb) VI) Mälʾǝktä Yaʿqob "Epistles of Jacob" [Jas.] (fols. 15vb-19rb) VII) Mälʾǝktä Yǝhuda "Epistle of Judah" [Jude] (fols. 19rb-20va) VIII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Rome "Epistle of Paul to the Romans" [Rom.] (fols. 22ra-35rb) IX) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos qädamawi ḫabä säbʾa Qorontos "First Epistle of Paul to the Corinthians" [1 Cor.] (fols. 35rb-49ra) X) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos dagǝmawi ḫabä säbʾa Qorontos "Second Epistle of Paul to the Corinthians" [2 Cor.] (fols. 49rb-58rb) XI) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Gälatya "Epistle of Paul to the Galatians" [Gal.] (fols. 58rb-62va) XII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa ʾEfeson "Epistle of Paul to the Ephesians" [Eph.] (fols. 62vb-67ra) XIII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Filṗǝsyos "Epistle of Paul to the Philippians" [Phil.] (fols. 67ra-70rb) XIV) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa Qwälasyǝs "Epistle of Paul to the Colossians" [Col.] (fols. 70va-73va) XV) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos qädamawi ḫabä säbʾa Täsälonqe "First Epistle of Paul to the Thessalonians" [1 Thes.] (fols. 73va-76va) XVI) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos dagǝmawi ḫabä säbʾa Täsälonqe "Second Epistle of Paul to the Thessalonians" [2 Thes.] (fols. 76vb-78rb) XVII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos qädamawi ḫabä Ṭimotewos "First Epistle of Paul to Timothy" [1 Tim.] (fols. 78va-82rb) XVIII) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos dagǝmawi ḫabä Ṭimotewos "Second Epistle of Paul to Timothy" [2 Tim.] (fols. 82rb-84vb) XIX) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä Tito "Epistle of Paul to Titus" [Tit.] (fols. 85ra-86va) XX) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä Filmona "Epistle of Paul to Philemon" [Phlm.] (fols. 86va-87rb) XXI) Mälʾǝktä Ṗawlos ḫabä säbʾa ʿǝbrawǝyan "Epistle of Paul to the Hebrews" [Heb.] (fols. 87rb-98ra) XXII) Gǝbrä ḥawaryat "Acts of the Apostles" [Acts] (fols. 99ra-134rb) XXIII) Raʾǝyä Yoḥannǝs "Revelation of John" [Rev.] (fols. 134va-151ra)
Additiones 1-2.

owners.owner: The name of the original owner (Wälättä <...>) has been erased from the concluding supplication of Text XXIII. The handwritten note in English "New testament Pauline" in the upper margin of fol. 4rb (in black fountain pen) and the number 228 written upside down on fol. 3v indicate that the book was most probably taken as booty from Mäqdäla Mädḫane ʿAläm (founded by Tewodros II, r. 1855-68). Possibly the note ሐዲሳት፡ ዘቅዱስ፡ ዮሐንስ in the upper margin of fol. 4ra (s. Additio 1) was written over an (partly) erased ownership note of the church Mäqdäla Mädḫane ʿAläm. According to Additio 2, Täsfa Śǝllase was previously (?) an owner of the Ms.

txstates.txstate: The leather cover is torn off from the spine (traces of adhesive are visible on the spine fold of the quires and on the leather cover of both boards). The Ms. was resewn. Tears amended on fols. 12, 139.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (back board broken and repaired) covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (6 tools were used: double line fillet, double line fillet with dots, interlaced line fillet, double circle, double crescent, small x; scored cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: A(3; s.l.: 2, stub after 1/fols. 1r-3v) – I(8/fols. 4r-11v) – II(10/fols. 12r-21v) – ፩III(8/fols. 22r-29v) – ፪IV(8/fols. 30r-37v) – ፫V(8/fols. 38r-45v) – ፬VI(8/fols. 46r-53v) – ፭VII(8/fols. 54r-61v) – ፮VIII(8/fols. 62r-69v) – ፯IX(8/fols. 70r-77v) – ፰X(8/fols. 78r-85v) – ፱XI(8/fols. 86r-93v) – ፲XII(5; s.l.: 1, stub after 5/fols. 94r-98v) – ፲፫XIII(8/fols. 99r-106v) – ፲፬XIV(6; s.l.: 1, stub after stub of 2; 2, stub after 6/fols. 107r-112v) – ፲፭XV(10/fols. 113r-122v) – ፲፫XVI(10/fols. 123r-132v) – ፲፬XVII(8/fols. 133r-140v) – ፲፯XVIII(10/fols. 141r-150v) – ፲፰XIX(1/fols. 151r-152v).

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting remains uniform throughout the Ms. with the exception of the rubricated passages on the incipit pages of Texts IV, V and VI which might have been written in a different hand.

rubrications.rubrication: A few lines on the incipit page of Texts I, VIII, XXII and XXIII; incipit of all other texts (four red lines alternating with black lines); two initial lines of all sections; the word kǝfl "section" and section numbers; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals in Text XXIII; elements of Ethiopic numerals throughout the Ms.

otherdetails.otherdetail: Most of the texts are followed by the note on stichometry.

additional.det: The note states that the Ms. of the church Qǝddus Yoḥannǝs Mäṭmǝq of Kwäkolo was purchased during the gäbäz-tenure of priest Bäkwǝrä Ṣǝyon with the church's money. It is written in an angular script, some letters appear in a forked shape (ተ, ን, ዝ), probably in the same hand that re-wrote (partly) the ownership note on fol. 4ra (upper margin, s. "owner").

additional.cont: Fol. 22r: Ownership note.
additional.det: The note is crudely written in the upper margin. It states Täsfa Śǝllase as an owner of the "Book of Paul" and mentions also the names of his mother Fǝre Maryam and his wife Wälättä Mikaʾel. Similar notes in the same hand are written on fols. 62vb, 78rb, 98rab, 134rb (partly erased), 151ra (partly erased). The same hand added the names of Täsfa Śǝllase (on fol. 29rb: Täsfa Sǝllasyä) and his wife on fols. 30vb, 35va, 48ra. In addition, the same scribe refers to the church of Kwäkwälo (fols. 52ra, 58ra) resp. of Däbrä Betel (fol. 82rb) as the owner.

extras.extra: - Corrections are written over erasures: e.g., fols. 12vb, 22va, 62ra, 64rb, 69ra, 97rb, 102rb, 104ra, 143va; or interlineally, in a secondary hand: e.g., fols. 13rb, 87rb. - Commentaries are written in the margin or interlineally throughout Text XXIII in small script, in a secondary hand; occasionally some passages are crudely marked with lines. - Pen trial: fol. 3v. - Writing exercises (?) on the ruled endleaves appear upside down, in different hands: fols. 1v, 3r. - Erased notes: fol. 3r. - Crude minor notes and scribbles, in secondary recent hands: fols. 2r, 21rb, 151r-152v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Decorated quire marks: fols. 22r: ፩, 30r: ፪, 38r: ፫, 346r: ፬, 54r: ፭, 62r: ፮, 70r: ፯, 78r: ፰, 86r: ፱, 94r: ፲, 99r: ፲፫(!), 107r: ፲፬, 113r: ፲፭, 123r: ፲፫(!), 133r: ፲፬, 141r: ፲፯(!), 151r: ፲፰.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid:
- The following notes are written in the main hand, in the upper margin, in red: fol. 58rb: ገላትያኒ፡ አሐቲ፡ መክፈልት፡ ይእቲ፡ እምዮናናውያን "Galatia is a part of the [land of the] Greeks." fol. 62vb: ዛቲ፡ ኤፌሶን፡ አሐቲ፡ መክፈልት፡ እምዮናናውያን፡ ወርእሰ፡ አብያተ፡ ክርስቲያናት፡ ዘዕስያ፡ ይእቲ፡ "This Ephesus is a part of the [land of the] Greeks and capital of the churches in Asia." fol. 67ra: ፊልጵስዩስኒ፡ ሊቅተ፡ መቄዶን[sic]፡ ይእቲ "Philippi is the main [part] of Macedonia." fol. 70va: ቈለስይስኒ፡ ቅርብት፡ ለምድረ፡ ዕስያ፡ ይእቲ። ወይነብሩ፡ ውስቴታ፡ ኅቡረ፡ አይሁድ፡ ወዮናናውያን፡ ኤጰፍራ፡ "Colossae is near to the land of Asia where Jews and Greeks lived together with Epaphras." fol. 73va: ተሰሎንቄኒ፡ አሐቲ፡ መክፈልት፡ ይእቲ፡ እመቄዶንያ፡ ውስቴታ፡ አይሁድ፡ ወአሐዛብ፡ ኅቡረ፡ "Thessaloniki is a part of Macedonia where Jews and pagans lived together". fol. 78va: በኤፌሶን "In Ephesus." fol. 85ra: ቀርጤስ "Crete".
- Coloured threads are inserted in the right upper corner of fols. 22r and 99r.
